mapper.update: update allot set ordersid=#{ordersid} , employid=#{employid} , addtime=#{addtime} , status=#{status} where allotid=#{allotid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.ordercode , c.realname from allot a , orders b , employ c where 1=1 and a.ordersid = b.ordersid and a.employid = c.employid order by allotid desc
select a.* , b.ordercode , c.realname from allot a , orders b , employ c where 1=1 and a.ordersid = b.ordersid and a.employid = c.employid and allotid=#{allotid} order by allotid desc

select a.* , b.ordercode , c.realname from allot a , orders b , employ c where 1=1 and a.ordersid = b.ordersid and a.employid = c.employid
and a.ordersid like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{ordersid}, '%'))

and a.status like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{status}, '%'))
